text: "I Don't Love You Anymore" is a single by the American country music artist Charlie Louvin. Released in May 1964, it was the first single from his album Less and Less/I Don't Love You Anymore. In the US, it peaked at number 4 on the Billboard Hot Country Singles chart. It also reached number 1 on the RPM Country Tracks chart in Canada. ==Chart performance== {|class="wikitable sortable" !align="left"|Chart (1964) !align="center"|Peak position |- |align="left"|U.S. Billboard Hot Country Singles |align="center"|4 |- |align="left"|Canadian RPM Country Tracks |align="center"|1 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1964 singles Category:Charlie Louvin songs Category:RPM Country Tracks number-one singles Category:Songs written by Bill Anderson (singer) Category:1964 songs
title: I Don't Love You Anymore
